General_Description: '''Injured on the Job''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met a man who claimed to have sailed with [[Barnabas]].
Section_Dialogue:
[[File:ACOD_-_Injured_on_the_Job_2.png|thumb|240px]] Kassandra found the man wandering. *'''Kassandra:''' Chaire. ''Anything you need a mercenary's help with?'' *'''Man:''' ''You! You sail aboard the [[Adrestia]] with Barnabas!'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''How do you know this, stranger?'' *'''Man:''' ''I once stood alongside him, until a filthy pirate ran his blade through my back. Now I can barely stand straight. I was replaced by you.'' |-|Sorry to hear that.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm sorry to hear of your injury. I had no idea I was taking anyone's place.'' |-|Not my problem.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I had nothing to do with your back or Barnabas' decision.'' *'''Man:''' ''Now I'll never get to sail with my son. You took everything from me. Now I'll take everything from you!'' The man started attacking Kassandra
(Quest Failed) *'''Man:''' ''The worst part is I always dreamed of sailing with my son. But with my back, I can't even collect enough wood to build a [[felucca|felluca]] for him.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''So you want me to give you some drachmae?'' *'''Man:''' ''Yes. Any drachmae you can give helps.'' ("Take this." [50 Drachmae]) *'''Kassandra:''' ''All right. Here it is.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra gave the man fifty drachmae to him buy a ''felluca'' for his son.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
